name: William and the Lands of Rage Html5
name_original: William and the Lands of Rage Html5
description:
keyboard

left arrow and right arrow too walk

up arrow too jump/double jump

control button for attack

controller

left stick to move

a button to jump/double jump

x button too attack

note: if you attach the controller or disattach it at the moment you will have too refresh the browser also the saving doesnt work at the moment this two bugs will be ironed out in the future
